description: Try our easy to follow Dry Tom Yum recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Dry Tom Yum Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 pkt Maggi Fusian Noodles Thai Tom Yum

recipeInstructions.text: Set aside flavour sachet and cook Maggi Fusian Thai Tom Yum Noodles according to packet instructions; drain and set aside.
In a fry pan on high, cook prawns for 2 minutes on each side or until cooked through. Remove prawns from pan, add mushrooms with flavour sachet, ginger and lemongrass.
Add onion and reserved noodles, and cook for a further 2 minutes. Toss prawns and cherry tomatoes through noodles and serve garnished with coriander.
